#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm> 
#include <iomanip> 

 
using namespace std;

long int maxx(long int x, long int y)
{
    return (x>y)?x:y;
}

int main()
{       
  
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  { string a,b;
   cin>>a>>b;
    int na[26]={0},nb[26]={0},i,j,f=0;
    for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
      {  na[(int)a[i]-97]+=1;
        // cout<<(int)a[i]-97<<" ";
      }
    for(i=0;i<b.length();i++)
    nb[(int)(b[i])-97]+=1;
    
    for(i=0;i<26;i++)
   {// cout<<na[i]<<" "<<nb[i];
       if(na[i]!=nb[i])
     f=1;
   }
   f==0?cout<<"YES\n":cout<<"NO\n";
  }
	return 0;
	
}
